誓.definition: oath; vow; to swear; to pledge

誓不兩立.definition: the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences; incompatible standpoints

誓不反悔.definition: to vow not to break one's promise

誓死不從.definition: to vow to die rather than obey (idiom)

誓死不降.definition: to vow to fight to the death

誓絕.definition: to abjure; to swear to quit

誓言.definition: to pledge; to promise; oath; vow
